name: Cox's Bazar - The Never Ending Sea Beach
desc: Upon arrival at Cox's Bazar check in at the hotel. Hotel Representative will pick you from the airport to the hotel.

name: The Ultimate Nepal Experience
desc: Welcome to Kathmandu International airport by our representative. Transfer to Kathmandu hotel by private car. Check-in at the hotel and overnight stay at Kathmandu hotel.

name: 5 Nights 6 Days of Glittering Nepal
desc: Travel to Kathmandu International Airport. Our representative will welcome you at the airport and will take you to the hotel by private car. Check-in at Hotel. Overnight stay at Kathmandu hotel.

name: Simply Maldives
desc: After arrival at the airport. Transfer to the Hotel on your own. Check-in at the hotel. Enjoy free time on your own. Overnight stay at the hotel.

name: Wonderful Indonesia
desc: On arrival to Airport, you will be welcomed by our representative. Then you will be transferred to hotel for check in, after check in free time for Leisure.

name: Timeless Charm Vietnam
desc: Upon arrival, our representative will be waiting at the airport holding a signboard with your name on it, he will take you to the hotel for check-in. Stay overnight in Hanoi.
